title: APT PUPIL - Stephen King. Read by Frank Muller {FerraBit}
description:
Apt Pupil, by Stephen King, originally 
published in Different Seasons (1982).

Narrated by Frank Muller.
Unabridged, 5 audio cassettes, 7.5 hours. 
Recorded Books Inc. ISBN 1-55690-027-9

I could not find this recording in digital format,
so I converted my copy of this recording to MP3.
From audio cassette (Nakamichi Dragon) to CD 
(Pioneer PDR-555RW) to MP3 (iTunes 8, 96kbps VBR).

Dolby NR was NOT used.
Some might say it's brighter without it, 
more muddled with it... you can post-process or
equalize to your liking.

Frank Muller is (was), in my opinion, the best book
on tape reader, ever. Stephen King was quoted saying
(something to the effect) that sometimes when he wrote, 
he heard Frank Muller's voice reading it.
(His reading of "Hunt for Red October" is a wonderful).

Cheers, FerraBit
January 2009
